text: While plastic surgery remains a go - to option, Hollywood actors get the ol ’ nip - and - tuck digitally, too. Back in June, the first set photo for Quentin Tarantino ’ s “ Once Upon A Time In Hollywood ” was released, featuring Leonardo DiCaprio and Brad Pitt as the out - of - work actor / stuntman duo Rick Dalton and Cliff Booth. But it seems that Sony accidentally uploaded a press file that, when loaded into Photoshop, showed that alterations were made to reduce DiCaprio ’ s chin and remove wrinkles from Pitt ’ s neck. The altered photo can be seen above, followed by the unaltered version. Before airbrushing ( Sony ) Before airbrushing ( Sony ) After airbrushing ( Sony ) After airbrushing ( Sony ) Sony
